txt.en: 'Midsummer is a joyous festival honouring the bonds of friendship, family, and marriage. All across Middle-earth, the Free Peoples celebrate through dance, song, artisanry, and rites of old!\n\n'If you wish to join in the festivities here in Bree-town, you should speak to Rona Turner near the ovens at the West Gate or Barliman Butterbur in the Prancing Pony.'
Where can I join in Midsummer festivities?
